solution_line_template: In this house, there are {total_cats} * {black_percentage} = <<{total_cats}*{black_percentage}={black_cats}>>{black_cats} black cats.
If there are two white cats, that means that there are {total_cats} - {black_cats} - {white_cats} = <<{total_cats}-{black_cats}-{white_cats}={grey_cats}>>{grey_cats} grey cats in this house.
